extendedInfo.description: The Official Crime Shield app.With the Crime Shield App, you can receive real time notifications for Crime Alerts occurring in your area, as they are entered into the Crime Shield database.Select from custom locations and categories, to get alerts delivered to your phone in real time.Don't go uninformed about criminal activity in your neighborhood any longer. With the Crime Shield app, get notified from members of your community about occurrences as they happen.Get Notified - Stay Protected.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app runs smooth good finding out about crime in the area.
reviews.author: matt ducas

reviews.title: Genius idea and execution
reviews.comment: Now I don\'t have to sift through pages of nonsense on local crime pages in the attempt to find something relevant to my area. The settings process is fast; alerts are timely and easy to read/understand. I highly recommend this app, and I\'m not entirely sure why this concept hasn\'t been done until now. Great job
reviews.author: Erin Scott

reviews.title: good Value
reviews.comment: happy to pay $2 if it helps reduce crime in my town great work 5/5
reviews.author: Trevor Berkley

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Very handy to know whats happening in the neighborhood, definitely recommend buying.
reviews.author: Jeremy Paterson
